text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You brag the country is opening back up good. It's not because of anything you've done!People are living in fear,fear of covid19, the fear of having no money,no food to feed their families,losing their homes. You put millions in this situation many have died because of you idiot! https://t.co/47gbi9iCqz
